content.raw:
I think we could play with the emission and specular colors to try and make them less dark. For example, with this diff:

~~~
diff -r 79622d2f8fa0 asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae
--- a/asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae	Wed May 10 16:18:06 2017 -0700
+++ b/asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae	Tue May 16 14:20:03 2017 -0700
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@
         <technique sid="common">
           <phong>
             <emission>
-              <color sid="emission">0 0 0 1</color>
+              <color sid="emission">1 1 1 1</color>
             </emission>
             <ambient>
               <color sid="ambient">1 1 1 1</color>
@@ -40,7 +40,7 @@
               <texture texture="asus_xtion_pro_camera_tex-sampler" texcoord="UVMap"/>
             </diffuse>
             <specular>
-              <color sid="specular">0.5 0.5 0.5 1</color>
+              <color sid="specular">1 1 1 1</color>
             </specular>
             <shininess>
               <float sid="shininess">50</float>
~~~

real | current | shiny
----- | ----- | -----
![asusreal.jpeg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/732144380-asusreal.jpeg) | ![asuscurrent.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/399688566-asuscurrent.png) | ![asusshiny.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1571734598-asusshiny.png)
content.html:
I think we could play with the emission and specular colors to try and make them less dark. For example, with this diff:

diff -r 79622d2f8fa0 asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae
--- a/asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae    Wed May 10 16:18:06 2017 -0700
+++ b/asus_xtion_pro_camera/meshes/asus_xtion_pro_camera.dae    Tue May 16 14:20:03 2017 -0700
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@
         <technique sid="common">
           <phong>
             <emission>
-              <color sid="emission">0 0 0 1</color>
+              <color sid="emission">1 1 1 1</color>
             </emission>
             <ambient>
               <color sid="ambient">1 1 1 1</color>
@@ -40,7 +40,7 @@
               <texture texture="asus_xtion_pro_camera_tex-sampler" texcoord="UVMap"/>
             </diffuse>
             <specular>
-              <color sid="specular">0.5 0.5 0.5 1</color>
+              <color sid="specular">1 1 1 1</color>
             </specular>
             <shininess>
               <float sid="shininess">50</float>
real current shiny
